Spheres.short_description: Distinct planes or levels of existence and consciousness

Physical.short_description: Material realm of tangible objects and physical laws

Etheric.short_description: Subtle energy plane connecting physical and astral realms

Astral.short_description: Plane of emotions, desires, and lower mental activities

Mental.short_description: Realm of thought, ideas, and intellectual consciousness

Causal.short_description: Plane of archetypal patterns and cosmic laws

Buddhic.short_description: Sphere of intuitive wisdom and universal consciousness

Atmic.short_description: Plane of spiritual will and divine purpose

Monadic.short_description: Realm of pure spirit and individual divine essence

Divine.short_description: Highest plane of absolute consciousness and unity

Celestial.short_description: Realm of higher spiritual beings and divine archetypes

Elemental.short_description: Plane of nature spirits and primordial forces

Vital.short_description: Sphere of life force and biological energy

Psychic.short_description: Realm of extrasensory perception and paranormal phenomena

Akashic.short_description: Plane containing universal memory and cosmic records

Devachanic.short_description: Heavenly realm of bliss and higher mental activity

Karmic.short_description: Sphere where cause and effect relationships manifest

Archetypal.short_description: Plane of primordial patterns and universal forms

Subtle.short_description: Intermediate realms between gross physical and causal planes

Supernal.short_description: Highest spiritual realms beyond ordinary conception

Infernal.short_description: Lower planes of purification and transformation

Intermediate.short_description: Transitional realms between major planes of existence

Ethereal.short_description: Refined planes of subtle energy and consciousness

Primordial.short_description: Original planes from which other spheres emerge

Unmanifested.short_description: Planes of pure potential and possibility

Temporal.short_description: Spheres subject to time and change
